'Fresh Radio' was a local radio station broadcasting to the Yorkshire Dales
in northern England on two medium wave (AM) frequencies and three FM
frequencies. It was also heard online via the Fresh Radio
[http://www.freshradio.co.uk website].
headings: Former presenters of Yorkshire Dales Radio and Fresh AM/Radio
